caption.p: 1H-NMR spectra of Glycyrrhiza uralensis Fisch. from different regions: Hangqi (1); Yanchi (2); Longxi (3); Baotou (4); Chifeng (5); Taklamakan Desert (6). The signals of four contents were at δ 8.187 − δ 8.172 ppm for isoliquiritin (A), δ 4.891- δ4.878 ppm for liquiritin. (B), δ 6.790- δ 6.776 ppm for liquiritigenin (C), and δ 5.75 ppm for dichloromethane (D).
